## We start with a table...

| Productgroup            | Product                   | Code      |
|:------------------------|---------------------------|-----------|
| Insecticide             | Affirm                    | W-7363-1  |
| Insecticide             | Blocker                   | W-7541    |
| Fungicide               | Fezan                     | W-6589    |

## Let's reshape to the SPO form

```{.ttl}


Affirm                    is a type of                Insecticide
Affirm                    has registration code       W-7363-1
Blocker                   is a type of                Insecticide
Blocker                   has registration code       W-7541
Fezan                     is a type of                Fungicide
Fezan                     has registration code       W-6589
```

## Ensure uniqueness with URIs

```{.ttl}


http://ppp.ch/Affirm      http://ppp.ch/isATypeOf     http://ppp.ch/Insecticide .
http://ppp.ch/Affirm      http://ppp.ch/hasCode       "W-7363-1" .
http://ppp.ch/Blocker     http://ppp.ch/isATypeOf     http://ppp.ch/Insecticide .
http://ppp.ch/Blocker     http://ppp.ch/hasCode       "W-7541" .
http://ppp.ch/Fezan       http://ppp.ch/isATypeOf     http://ppp.ch/Fungicide .
http://ppp.ch/Fezan       http://ppp.ch/hasCode       "W-6589" .
```

## Make it more legible

```{.ttl}
@prefix : <http://ppp.ch/> .

:Affirm                   :isATypeOf                  :Insecticide .
:Affirm                   :hasCode                    "W-7363-1" .
:Blocker                  :isATypeOf                  :Insecticide .
:Blocker                  :hasCode                    "W-7541" .
:Fezan                    :isATypeOf                  :Fungicide .
:Fezan                    :hasCode                    "W-6589" .
```

## Repeated subjects can be omitted

```{.ttl}
@prefix : <http://ppp.ch/> .

:Affirm                   :isATypeOf                  :Insecticide ;
                          :hasCode                    "W-7363-1" .
:Blocker                  :isATypeOf                  :Insecticide ;
                          :hasCode                    "W-7541" .
:Fezan                    :isATypeOf                  :Fungicide ;
                          :hasCode                    "W-6589" .
```

## Use existing schemas {auto-animate="true"}

```{.ttl}
@prefix :     <http://ppp.ch/> .
@prefix rdf:  <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .

:Affirm                   rdf:type                    :Insecticide ;
                          :hasCode                    "W-7363-1" .
:Blocker                  rdf:type                    :Insecticide ;
                          :hasCode                    "W-7541" .
:Fezan                    rdf:type                    :Fungicide ;
                          :hasCode                    "W-6589" .
```

## Replace `rdf:type` with `a` {auto-animate="true"}

```{.ttl}
@prefix :     <http://ppp.ch/> .
@prefix rdf:  <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .

:Affirm                   a                           :Insecticide ;
                          :hasCode                    "W-7363-1" .
:Blocker                  a                           :Insecticide ;
                          :hasCode                    "W-7541" .
:Fezan                    a                           :Fungicide ;
                          :hasCode                    "W-6589" .
```

## Make knowledge explicit {auto-animate="true"}

```{.ttl}
@prefix :     <http://ppp.ch/> .
@prefix rdf:  <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .
@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .

:Pesticide                rdfs:label                  "Pesticide"@en ;
                          rdfs:comment                "Chemical used against pests."@en .
:Insecticide              rdfs:subClassOf             :Pesticide ;
                          rdfs:label                  "Insecticide"@en ;
:Fungicide                rdfs:subClassOf             :Pesticide ;
                          rdfs:label                  "Fungicide"@en ;
                          owl:disjointWith            :Insecticide .
:Affirm                   a                           :Insecticide ;
                          :hasCode                    "W-7363-1" .
:Blocker                  a                           :Insecticide ;
                          :hasCode                    "W-7541" .
:Fezan                    a                           :Fungicide ;
                          :hasCode                    "W-6589" .
```


## Use OWL {auto-animate="true"}

```{.ttl}
@prefix :     <http://ppp.ch/> .
@prefix rdf:  <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .
@prefix owl:  <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .
@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .
@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .

:Pesticide                a                           owl:Class ;
                          rdfs:label                  "Pesticide"@en ;
                          rdfs:comment                "Chemical used against pests."@en .
:hasCode                  a                           owl:DatatypeProperty ;
                          rdfs:label                  "Federal registration code"@en ;
                          rdfs:domain                 :Pesticide ;
                          rdfs:range                  xsd:string .
:Insecticide              rdfs:subClassOf             :Pesticide ;
                          rdfs:label                  "Insecticide"@en ;
:Fungicide                rdfs:subClassOf             :Pesticide ;
                          rdfs:label                  "Fungicide"@en ;
                          owl:disjointWith            :Insecticide .
:Affirm                   a                           :Insecticide ;
                          :hasCode                    "W-7363-1" .
:Blocker                  a                           :Insecticide ;
                          :hasCode                    "W-7541" .
:Fezan                    a                           :Fungicide ;
                          :hasCode                    "W-6589" .
```
